name: Hunter: The Reckoning
description:
Hunter: The Reckoning is an action game developed by High Voltage Software. It was originally released in 2001. It was published by Interplay Productions. Hunter: The Reckoning has a Metascore of 70, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Hunter: The Reckoning on GameCube and Xbox.
